common.error_friendly: Something went wrong. Please check your connection and try again.
common.ai_limit_daily_desc: You have reached the daily limit of {{limit}} uses for this feature. Please come back tomorrow to continue.
common.ai_limit_weekly_desc: You have reached the weekly limit of {{limit}} uses for this feature. Please come back next week to continue.

auth.reset_password_desc: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
auth.reset_link_sent_desc: If an account exists with that email, you will receive instructions shortly.

login.subtitle: Log in to continue your health journey.
login.create_account_subtitle: Start your health journey with us today.
login.terms_privacy: By continuing, you agree to our <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

onboarding.toast_error: Error saving profile. Please try again.

gender.title: What is your gender?
gender.description: This helps us calculate your nutritional needs more accurately.

age.title: How old are you?
age.description: Age is a key factor in determining your basal metabolic rate (BMR).

experience.title: Have you used nutrition apps before?
experience.description: This helps us tailor the complexity of the app.
experience.first_time: No, this is my first time

metrics.title: Your current measurements
metrics.description: We need your current weight and height to calculate your BMI and goals.

motivation.title: What motivates you the most?
motivation.description: Knowing your motivation helps us keep you focused.
motivation.healthier: To be healthier and prevent diseases
motivation.energy: To have more energy throughout the day
motivation.feel_better: To feel better about myself and my body

goal.title: What is your main goal?
goal.description: We will calculate your daily calorie and macro needs based on this.

goal_weight.title: What is your goal weight?
goal_weight.description: We will track your progress towards this goal.
goal_weight.disclaimer: You can change this goal at any time in the settings.

weekly_rate.title: How fast do you want to achieve it?
weekly_rate.description: A safe and sustainable rate is recommended for long-term success.
weekly_rate.fast_desc: Fast rate. Requires high discipline and may be harder to sustain.
weekly_rate.slow_desc: Slow and steady rate. Highly sustainable and minimizes muscle loss.
weekly_rate.balanced_desc: Balanced rate. Effective and manageable for most people.

notifications.title: Stay Consistent
notifications.description: Turn on notifications to get reminders for meals, hydration, and weight checks. It helps you stay on track!

final.title: Ready to start?
final.description: Calorel uses AI to help you achieve your goals faster and more sustainably.

timeline.reminder_desc: We will send you a reminder before the trial ends.
timeline.billing_desc: If you don't cancel, the subscription will begin.

buttons.no_payment_note: No charge for the first 3 days.

generating_plan.step3: Generating your first week's meal plan...
generating_plan.step4: Plan ready! Redirecting to your dashboard.

home.title: Calorel
home.goal_achieved_toast: Great! Based on your rate, you should reach your goal weight around {{date}}.
home.start_logging: Tap the '+' button to log your first meal or exercise.

scanner.error_camera_desc: Please grant camera permissions in your device settings.
scanner.help_desc: Point the camera at your food or menu. Ensure good lighting and a clear view for the best AI analysis.
scanner.flash_unavailable: Flash/Torch is unavailable on this device or camera.
scanner.disclaimer_text: The results from this scanner are AI-based estimations. They may not be 100% accurate and should not be considered medical advice.

menu_analysis.title: Menu Analysis
menu_analysis.partial_list_note: Note: This analysis does not list the entire menu. The AI has filtered the content to show only the best options for your goal and what to avoid.

analysis.default_reason: Analysis based on visual estimation and common portion sizes.

manual_food.title: Manual Food Entry
manual_food.desc_placeholder: e.g., Large portion with vinaigrette dressing
manual_food.error_analysis: Failed to analyze food. Please check the description.
manual_food.ai_disclaimer: Note: Nutritional values are AI-generated estimates.

exercise.title: Log Exercise
exercise.subtitle: Choose how you want to track your activity.

running.title: Running / Cardio
running.intensity_low_desc: Light effort, easy to maintain a conversation.
running.intensity_high_desc: High effort, difficult to speak more than a few words.

weights.title: Strength Training
weights.intensity_low_desc: Focus on high reps, low weight, or light stretching.
weights.intensity_high_desc: Heavy lifting, high effort, long rest periods.

write_exercise.title: AI Exercise Analysis
write_exercise.placeholder: Describe your workout. E.g., 'I ran for 45 minutes at a moderate pace' or 'I did 1 hour of heavy weightlifting.'
write_exercise.example: The AI will estimate the calories burned based on your description and profile.

manual_exercise.title: Manual Calories
manual_exercise.validation_error: Please enter a valid calorie amount.

progress.title: Progress
progress.subtitle: Track your journey and celebrate your achievements.
progress.weight_progress_no_data: Not enough data to display the chart.
progress.weight_progress_start_logging: Log your weight regularly to see your progress.

bmi_calculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmi_calculator.incomplete_data: Complete your height and weight in settings to calculate your BMI.
bmi_calculator.tooltip: The Body Mass Index (BMI) is a measure used to screen for weight categories that may lead to health problems. It is calculated by dividing weight by the square of the height. It is an estimate and should not be used as the sole indicator of health.

streak_modal.title: Daily Streak!
streak_modal.subtitle: You've logged food or exercise for {{streak}} consecutive days. Keep up the great work!

badges.title: Achievements
badges.subtitle: Unlock badges by achieving milestones in your health journey.

streak_1.name: First Log
streak_1.desc: Log your first meal or exercise.

share.meal_message: I just analyzed my {{food}} with Calorel! Check out my nutrition.
share.badge_message: I just unlocked the '{{name}}' achievement on Calorel! Time to celebrate.

diets.title: Diet Plans
diets.subtitle: Explore personalized diet plans generated by AI.
diets.regenerate_dialog_desc: Generating a new plan will consume one of your weekly AI uses. Are you sure you want to proceed?
diets.gap_time_message: It's break time. Remember to stay hydrated and prepare for your next meal!

diets_onboarding.title: Personalized Diet Plan
diets_onboarding.subtitle: Answer a few questions to generate your custom weekly meal plan.
diets_onboarding.step_country_desc: This helps the AI suggest local and accessible ingredients.
diets_onboarding.country_expansion_note: We currently support local cuisine suggestions for these countries. If yours is not listed, select 'United States' for a general Western diet.
diets_onboarding.step1_desc: How active are you on a typical week?
diets_onboarding.step2_desc: Select any dietary restrictions or preferences.
diets_onboarding.step3_desc: Tell us about your cooking habits and budget.
diets_onboarding.generating_step2: Adapting plan to local cuisine in {{country}}...
diets_onboarding.generating_step2_generic: Adapting plan to general Western cuisine...
diets_onboarding.generating_step5: Plan ready! Saving to your profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your profile, goals, and preferences.

deleteDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.subtitle: Configure Alerts
reminders.description: Receive local notifications to maintain your habits. Max 4 per day.

nutritional_goals.title: Nutritional Goals
nutritional_goals.subtitle: Adjust your daily targets. Changes are saved automatically.

ai_suggestions.disclaimer: AI will use this info to calculate your optimal calorie and macro targets.

ring_colors.title: Ring Colors
ring_colors.subtitle: Understand what each color means on your daily progress rings.
ring_colors.green_desc: You are within 10% of your goal (or exceeded it safely).
ring_colors.yellow_desc: You are between 10% and 20% over your goal (e.g. too many calories).
ring_colors.red_desc: You are more than 20% over your goal, indicating significant excess.
ring_colors.dotted_desc: No data logged for this day yet.

request_feature.title: Request a Feature
request_feature.subtitle: Help us improve Calorel!
request_feature.description: Vote for existing features or suggest a new one. Most voted are prioritized.

new_request_drawer.title: Suggest a New Feature
new_request_drawer.description: Describe the feature you would like to see in Calorel.
new_request_drawer.desc_placeholder: Explain why this feature is important and how it should work.

toasts.coming_soon_desc: This feature is currently in development.
toasts.delete_success_desc: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.

tutorial.welcome_content: Let's take a quick tour of the main features to start your health journey.
tutorial.carousel_content: Here you will find your daily progress for calories, macros, and other key metrics. Swipe to see more details!
tutorial.scanner_content: Tap the center button to open the menu. You can scan your food with AI, log an exercise, or add entries manually.
tutorial.progress_content: Visit the Progress tab to see your weight evolution, BMI, and track your daily streaks.
tutorial.settings_content: In Settings, you can modify your goals, change preferences, and manage your account.

notifications.title: Stay Consistent
notifications.description: Turn on notifications to get reminders for meals, hydration, and weight checks. It helps you stay on track!
notifications.breakfast_body: Start your day by logging your breakfast.
notifications.food_body_1: What's for lunch? Log it now.
notifications.dinner_body_1: Don't forget to log your last meal.
notifications.water_body_1: Your body needs water. Drink a glass!
notifications.weight_body_1: Update your weight today to see your progress.
